consent.headline: We track things.
consent.body: We use Google Analytics to see how many people click our weird links. It helps us fix bugs. We don't sell your data.

privacy.data_collect_body: When you use NeoLink, we may collect the following data through Google Analytics: your IP address (anonymized), browser type and version, device information, pages visited and click data, and referral source.
privacy.how_use_body: We use analytics data exclusively for: understanding how our service is used, identifying and fixing bugs, improving user experience, and monitoring service performance.
privacy.third_parties_body: We use the following third-party services:
privacy.third_parties_ga: Google Analytics 4 — For anonymous usage statistics. Google's privacy policy applies.
privacy.third_parties_firebase: Firebase (Google) — For data storage. Firebase's terms of service apply.
privacy.your_rights_body: Under GDPR and applicable privacy laws, you have the right to: access your personal data, request deletion of your data, withdraw consent at any time via the Privacy Settings button, and lodge a complaint with a supervisory authority.
